member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.
member.returns: true if the method can be called; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames
member.summary: Gets a list of available views.

member.summary: Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
member.param: true to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.

member.name: T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView
member.summary: Provides a design-time view of data for the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.#ctor(System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the with the provided data source designer.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.CanDelete
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports deletes.
member.returns: true if deletes are supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.CanInsert
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports inserts.
member.returns: true if inserts are supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging through data returned by a query.
member.returns: true if paging is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
member.returns: true if sorting is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.CanUpdate
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports updates.
member.returns: true if updates are supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData(System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
member.returns: The data to display at design time.
member.param: The minimum number of rows to return.
true to indicate that the returned data is sample data; false to indicate that the returned data is live data.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDesignerDataSourceView.Schema
member.summary: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
member.returns: An object that represents the schema.
